documents.document: @TheACCnz you guys gona tweet when it is up and running on IHeart?
Argh shit way of ending the match with a challenge there from Nadal but my lord what an incredible game. Fed you are a beast #AusOpen
Here we go! Fifth set for all the marbles. Cmon Fed! #AusOpen #FedExpress
The most excited I think I've ever been for a tennis match. Hope it's a great one! Potentially for the last time in a major final #AusOpen
If I didn't just see Venus play tennis I would have thought she was drunk during that speech...very odd #AusOpen
Who would have thought that after the shitshow Serena put up in Auckland that she would win the @AustralianOpen #Serena
Is this just my sky go app with the background music or is there very noticeable music playing during the tennis?
Good show! This guy is gona be a legit star https://t.co/acnNdLbIvZ
For all the hype of La La Land I can't believe how average Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone are at singing in it #Oscars2017
Lot of respect for Stan to come back in this match. Really hope Fed pulls through though #AusOpen #fedexpress
Let's hope Fed wraps this up in three so I can get some sleep tonight! #AusOpen #FedExpress
@CamRussNZ I dunno, I think since they won't ever pay for huge stars they need to take swings at potential stars early. I'm more than happy
@CamRussNZ He was alright, bit of an average player i never really paid much attention to. Solid fielder but was nothing too special
Since I've watched tennis I don't remember two bigger upsets in a slam from the men's side. Amazing tourney so far #AusOpen
Would be interesting to see who have legitimately left America because of Trump...lots of pre election threats but haven't heard much
Erakovic's been such a frustrating watch the last decade. Really hope Jade Lewis or some other kiwi comes through soon to compete at majors
That DRS was absolutely painful #NZvBAN
Can't believe the cricket is on at the moment...in Wadestown it's atrocious weather right now
Wow @AtlantaFalcons offense looked ðŸ”¥on that drive. Should be a great game #NFLPlayoffs
Was planning on going to day 4 of the @BLACKCAPS test today so hope the weather clears! Terrible at the moment
This speech from the ASB guy is teeeeerrrrribbble #asbclassic
Every time I see the NZ lineup it makes me think we can't compete against the big test nations. Batting lineup worries me #NZvBAN
Three days back at work and completely over the "how was your Christmas?" questions....do you really care? I know I don't about yours
Could not be more against FIFA expanding the World Cup teams. Oceania automatically qualifying would be a joke esp w/Aussie not in region
@vodafoneNZ eta said 4.30 to fix wadestown internet issues. Can you update the website with a new eta?
What a day to return to Welly. Beautiful non windy summers day. Can't beat Wellington on a good day! #summertime
Got to see Serena Williams which was great but also got to see her play like she couldn't give a shit too which was not so great #asbclassic
Venus Williams looked underwhelming to say the least but I'm sure she is just pissing around here. Counting down to Serena's match
Off to see the greatest women's tennis player ever tomorrow at the @ASB_Classic should be amazing
Stoked to be there the night she started this reign! Still a Bayley type of guy though #WWENXT https://t.co/71aZIRa0vi
Heading to @aucklandzoo for first time today. Heard great things hope the weather holds. Love Welly zoo so hope this is up to that standard
Catching a flight on New Year's Day is daunting but luckily I don't have any traces of a hangover! Great start to 2017 #happynewyear
This is actually pretty hilarious @andrewbogut teaching Macs Aussie slang https://t.co/PT91nxpDPn
Just got tickets to see @AnaIvanovic in Auckland in January. Should be a great event

Queenstown putting on some awful weather for us unfortunately! Not much to do here on a rainy day that's for sure
Obligatory signpost photo in Bluff. Continuing to work hard! #worktravel #bluff #sunnydayâ€¦ https://t.co/2h1txILUDH
Dunedin gave us a beautiful day to be here for work! Love this city
Know it's hard for broadcasts to change graphics as ppl are used to old ones but really don't like the new scoreboard on Sky for @BLACKCAPS
Fantastic Beasts is a solid movie. Some great H.P nostalgia and great characters. Disappointing storyline though. 7/10 #FantasticBeasts
Fantastic beasts tonight! Love premieres, hope it lives up to the hype #FantasticBeasts #HARRYPOTTER
@Channing_Frye is quickly moving his way into my fav top 10 cavs of all time conversation. Beautiful jumper and saves so many games for us
@CamRussNZ haven't tried last chance U...worth a watch? Netflix is amazing man. The US one is miles better but NZ one still decent.
Roman Empire: Reign of Blood on @NetflixANZ is well worth a watch. A combo of documentary/drama which is unique but really entertaining
First time trying Pringles cheeseburger flavor...tastes terrible. Don't bother!
I know the Cavs are on ESPN but Aussie cricket is having a meltdown on sky sport 3!
The Rhys Darby @FlyAirNZ safety video is the worst one I've seen. Fly so often lately for work and am embarrased for NZ by it. Awful
First cuddles with my first nephew Ryan. So cute and cuddly @ Auckland, New Zealand https://t.co/wJGQYyq3h4
Really disappointed that @WWENXT pulled out of NZ in December. Had great tickets bought. Glad I saw them in Dallas earlier this year
In sunny Nelson for work and unfortunately it's not at all sunny! Need to kill time until 5 but really not sure what to do on a bad day here
Had never read more than 4 books in a year, trying to read 1 every 2 weeks (26) this year. Just finished 20th so going to be a tight finish!
@NBALPSupport my iPhone NBA app won't play the cavs 76ers game for more than 10 seconds on either feed. Run into it a lot. Any fix?
This #WorldSeries has been insane. Rain delay now?! Cmon don't strand us like this! Imagine being in that stadium
Anyone seen clan of the cave bear? Heard the book is great but my lord the movie was terrible

@Ben_Francis136 couldn't have said it better! Great to watch
Really wish they found a way to get @matthewdelly to the ring ceremony #NBATipOff #RingCeremony
Kevin love continues to be one of the most frustrating players I've supported. He has so many opportunities but rarely converts for Cavs

This might be the craziest end to a game I have seen. Lucky these kickers are vets or else they might be cut before the end of the night
Still think this @NZBreakers team is very likable but man we need to fix our fouling, FT's, shot selection, TOs and overall offense ASAP
Hasn't scored a try but this might be the best test I've seen Folau play in his career. An absolute beast out there
Might be first time ever I've got sympathy for the Wallabies. Terrible call earlier by TMO now unlucky all over the park. All Blacks lucky

Just watched my first episode of Funny Girls...have to say it was hilarious! One or the best NZ comedy shows I've seen in a while
After that game I came out of it more worried for S.A rugby than impressed by ABs. Lions looked so good in super rugby. Complete opposite
Forgetting to not check twitter/FB in the morning after recording the rugby is soul crushing. Looks like it's well worth a watch though!
Damn I'm gona miss @matthewdelly this season. Going to be a much bigger loss than people seem to realize https://t.co/1alEwEW1Sw #Cavs
Fun first half for the @NZBreakers should be a good year. Need better rebounding but love the hustle and unselfishness so far #NBL17

This game has lost all its rhythm. Hard to watch! #AllBlacks

@CamRussNZ hmm frustrating. Gona be a loooong season
